data.persona: I am a holy person. With authority from god.
data.description:
You are in the the spring bath.
The spring bath is a deep, natural pool of crisp and clear spring water. It is surrounded by rose bushes on all sides except a northern and southern opening, which lead out of the enclosure of roses.
The pig is here.

You are carrying a Cross.

data.short_motivation: I must get in the spring bath
data.mid_motivation: I must take a spring bath to cleanse myself of all negative energies
data.long_motivation: I am performing an exorcism next month and must emit pure energy
